full_summary:
# P3 Advisory Services - Municipal Finance

### Invitation to Provide Information
**Reference**: PW-22-01014144 (amendment 1)

**Solicitation Number**: INFC-2022/23-PS4322

**Publication Date**: November 22, 2022

**Tender Closing Date**: November 25, 2022, at 00:00 hours EST

The Office of Infrastructure of Canada (InfraCanada) invites suppliers to submit their qualifications for P3 Advisory Services related to municipal finance, in accordance with the Supply Arrangement letter EZ156-170002. Solicitation number INFC-22. This call follows the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and CCFTA.

### Contract Description
P3 Advisory Services will support the development of alternative financial models, which will optimize the delivery of critical municipal infrastructure across the country.

A maximum of 1 contract is expected to be awarded. The contract authority is Jennifer Hendrick at procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca or 343-543-0187. To inquire about this solicitation, you must contact the above-mentioned Contract Authority.

Letters to Potential Suppliers under the Arrangement (LTPS) were issued by Prescience Corp for ADV ER support Managing arrangement to Maxwell Moon.

As stated by Situ Xiumei of the contract authority: candidates are selected from the list of firms in the [Supply Arrangement] and prescirred regarding their availability to perform the advisory service requirement.


### Eligibility and Selection Criteria
